channel.title: Get disconnected when I try to walk. Help plz
channel.description: I have tried three different server and client sources but every time I log in everything works until I try to walk then it disconnects me and says "ClientHandler: Client V3nge disconnected (127.0.0.1)" even though I changed the ip to my ip instead of 127.0.0.1. I am running vista and I have java jdk and jre 6.17. Help if you can please. Ty

item.title: Get disconnected when I try to walk. Help plz
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

i have 8 rep cuz of some idiot gravedigging an old post from like 2 years ago when i was a noob and 2 ppl rep-- me plus idc about my grammar i know how to use grammar i choose not to cuz its way faster to type do like it who cares?

edit: now quit replying and pm me if you have a problem with me idc if you do just let this die where it should of a long time ago

Read full topic

item.title: Get disconnected when I try to walk. Help plz
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

kickyamom50:

I know the problem…i had this before to and i kept getting dc’d apon walk…what i did was i erased all java files on my computer completely so that there wasn’t a trace of them. then i downloaded the newest versions of jdk, environment variables, java, and anything i needed for java. and then after that, it worked. so you should do the same and hopefully it works… rep++ me if it does please!

dont request rep plus read the damn date and if there was a grave dig dont reply

Read full topic
